entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a few overloads to StringBuilder to eliminate temp allocs #68450
  • Immutable*<T> classes do not perform well #68449
  • Improve event pipe thread time analysis by detecting blocking methods #68446
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests (linux-arm64) #68443
  • Delete old workflow run entries from backport pipeline #68440
  • System.Text.Json Utf8JsonReader invalid json handling #68439
  • [Feature request]EventSource events for File IO #68435
  • Collectible AssemblyLoadContext is collected by GC while type from it is still alive #68434
  • Assert failure: CheckInstrBytePattern(epilogBase[offset] & X86_INSTR_RET, X86_INSTR_RET, epilogBase[offset]) || CheckInstrBytePattern(epilogBase[offset], X86_INSTR_JMP_NEAR_REL32, epilogBase[offset]) || CheckInstrWord(*PTR_WORD(epilogBase + offset), X86_INSTR_w_JMP_FAR_IND_IMM) #68431
    7.0.0

Closed

  • HttpResponseMessage.ToString() prints Content as an object #68369
  • Failed Assembly.Load and Assembly.LoadFile leaks memory #58093
    7.0.0
  • Implement PAL test for the PAL_GetResourceString #4130
    Future
  • Tests do not time-out on Linux #5802
    Future
  • Console can allocate too much on the stack with a custom encoding #68395
  • GC behavior under pressure? #6772
    Future
  • pin over SPMI has unexpectedly high variance #68214
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.IncrementalGenerationTests.ChangingMarshallingStrategy_RegeneratesStub #61643
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17/EndInit_ResumesPausedEnableRaisingEvents(setBeforeBeginInit: True) #24181
    Future
  • Rolling build test failure: System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Create_MultipleFilters with message "Created event did not occur as expected" #67601
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact/ToString: inconsistent handling of abbreviated month names (MMM) in culture de-DE #68385

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the redundant branch optimization to handle more side effects #68447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make PlatformDetection.IsInHelix lazy #68445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Removed TempFile and TempDirectory from FileSystemWatcher Tests #68444
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py to use retrying download from jitutil.py #68442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use unchecked barriers for stores to statics in more cases #68437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load #68203
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential stack overflow in StdInReader #68398
    area-System.Console
  • Use a constant for stackalloc in Interop.Errors #68438
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add retries to some FSW tests #68368
    area-System.IO
  • Add more diagnostics to intermittently failing assert in JSON #68414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-diffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix entry point for waveOutGetDevCaps #68418
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Don't remove GT_NO_OP "non-removable" NOP #68114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Improve List performance in IEnumerable.SequenceEqual #67722
    area-System.Linq, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Fixing and improving the `BOX;BR[COND]` pattern match #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Use checked arithmetic to prevent stack overflow in Pkcs12Kdf #68422
    area-System.Security
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta, no-recent-activity
  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono, no-recent-activity
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code formatting applies to `stackalloc` collection initializer syntax #60921
  • An explicit interfaces cause incorrect CS8618 Non-nullable property must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor. #60920

Closed

  • Visual Studio should take global using directives (e.g. ImplicitUsings) into account when creating new C# files #60912

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type (Approach 2) #60933
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Verify arguments length for diagnostic messages #60925
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Consolidate and simplify visibility checks in the tagger. #60923
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use dotnet bot instead of vslsnap for insertions #60917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add back deprecated packages to arcade publishing config. #60932
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60930
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60928
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #60926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main into features/ref-fields #60914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • reopen issue #10117 - IIS app pool recycle throws 503 errors #41340
  • NullReference exception when evaluating JS #41339
  • ValidationMessageStore.Add field accessor parameter shows a warning for nullable properties #41338
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #41336

PullRequests

Created

  • Throw BadHttpRequestException for non-ASCII in absolute-form targets #41334
    area-runtime
  • Unify initialization in DefaultHttpContextFactory #41333
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Stick w/ `$(RepositoryCommit)` #41314
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-runtime
  • Add MapGroup #41265
    area-web-frameworks
  • Debug `dotnet restore` problems #41331
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23

Issues

Created

  • Add more profiles for dotnet trace with known .NET events #3026

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Grid inside a StackLayout with Padding, exceeds view limit. #6451
  • [Windows] Can't include MAUI and WinForms in the same project #6450
  • [Bug] Checkbox with excess margin on the right side. #6449
  • ListView-nested VerticalStackLayout does not resize/expand to reveal unhidden children (IsVisible=true) #6448
  • [Enhancement] (HybridWebView) - Invoke C# code from JavaScript #6446
  • Creating "bottom sheet dialog" doesn't render correctly #6445
  • RC1 - SearchBar does not detect assigned Style #6444
  • RC1 - The BackgroundColor of the BoxView does not work #6443
  • Secure storage calling twice/thrice bug #6437
  • PreferencesImplementation is inaccessable due to its protection level #6436

Closed

  • How to remove loading ... when maui blazor app is starting #6438
  • ControlTemplate not rendered if applied to a ContentPage #5976
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] ControlTemplate isn't rendering #2302
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Shell FlyoutIsPresented not working on Windows #5653
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [RC1] Label MaxLines doesn't work #6030
    6.0.300-rc.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a default handler for all views #6447
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.3

Merged

  • Use control template for PresentedContent on a ContentPage, if available #6428
  • Fix FlyoutIsPresented permutations #6388
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3

Updated

  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.12.1 to 0.13.1 #6352
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidOperationException: The expression 'r' is invalid inside an 'Include' operation, since it does not represent a property access #27873
  • How to handle DateTime with Unix timestamps in SQLite #27872

Closed

  • EF Core with spatial column throws exception: Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.SqlServer.Types #27804
  • How to implement Row_Number() over (Partition By Order By) in EntityFramework Core 5? #27795
  • How to define a view with linq query results? #27822
  • How to dymamic map Column when according to the language environment? #27815
  • is HasComputedColumnSql bug or wrong way to use? #27814
  • Efcore sometimes fails to save related data. #27803
  • Question: Use SaveChanges interception to perform actions after database update was successful #27725
  • Interception: raw query vs. LINQ #22899
  • EnsureDeleted() is not supported in SQLite in-memory mode #26707
  • EF Core 2 Migrations in VSTS CD Release #9841
  • PERF: Investigate optimized rows affected round-tripping when batching #7038
  • Perf: improve batching for TPH #3954
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop validating non-null/empty connection strings #27874
